data.title: Social network for education
data.label: Graduation project
data.description: A social network designed for education and sharing learning material. It includes a powerful post editor, realtime communication tools and a simple recommendation system. This was my *final year project* at Swansea University.

data.title: Rats Game
data.label: Coursework
data.description: A clone of the game Rats! by Sean O'Connor that was released in 1996. The premise of the game is to kill all the rats using items before they reproduce and over run the maze. This was a group coursework and was developed by *me and 6 other students*.
